name: trans Slack Bot demo
description: A translation bot for Slack that translates a message when a user reacted with an emoji (The specifications are based on reacjilator: https://github.com/slackAPI/reacjilator)

ARXIV_CHECK_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID for posting paper from arXiv

ARXIV_CHECK_KEYWORD.description: Keyword for searching paper from arXiv

ARXIV_CHECK_FROM_DAYS_BEFORE.description: Searching start date (in days from now)

ARXIV_CHECK_TO_DAYS_BEFORE.description: Searching end date (in days from now)

ARXIV_CHECK_AVOID_DUPLICATED_POSTING.description: Suppress duplicated posting (while heroku dyno is alive)

ARXIV_CHECK_TRANS.description: Translation target language code ('ja' for Japanese), if this value is 'none', no translation will be performed
